text:
if execute "ant.bat" in <exec> 
ant will go on and on
I think it's a problem for many people
whatever we should not execute ant in ant,
so executing ant should be forbidden in <exec>

I do not think that this is a bug.
I have often called ant from within
an exec task, to test features (like antlib).
